name: Rumble Roses
description:
Rumble Roses is a fighting game developed by Yuke's Co. It came out on 09-11-2004. It was published by Konami. On review aggregator Metacritic, Rumble Roses has a score of 66. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Rumble Roses on PlayStation 2.
It was produced by Akari Uchida and Norifumi Hara. Hiromi Furuta and Mugio Awano directed the game. Akira Yamaoka, Michiru Yamane and Mutsuhiko Izumi scored the game.
